block.field: Tells Vector to drive in a straight line.
Turn the robot around its current position.
Will sleep/wait for given amount seconds
Tells Vector to dock with a light cube, optionally using a given approach angle and distance.
Tells Vector to dock with a light cube, optionally using a given approach angle and distance.
The minimum angle the robot’s head can be set to.
The maximum angle the robot’s head can be set to
Tells Vector to dock with a light cube, optionally using a given approach angle and distance.
The largest height-above-ground that lift can be moved to
The lowest height-above-ground that lift can be moved to
Starts an animation playing on a robot. Vector must be off of the charger to play an animation.
Returns animation name or trigger that best matches given tags (or is randomly selected)
Display an image on Vector’s Screen (his “face”).
Enables to pick photo from Vector C2 gallery
